commit_message:
ARC parser: Don't add MIME field to buffer

We're ignoring it anyway and in the case of a bogus MIME entry it could get prepended to the length field.
previous_commit_message:
Release 0.27.0

New features

* Added a HttpRequest.Builder(method, uri) constructor that populates
  the Host header.

Bugs fixed:

* WarcWriter.fetch(uri) was omitting the query string

Changes:

* ARC parser now accepts garbage in the MIME field
* HTTP parser in lenient mode now accepts messages without a minor
  version number (e.g. "HTTP/2") #70

commit_message: CdxRequestEncoder: Handle non-ASCII characters in form request body the same way as pywb
previous_commit_message:
CdxRequestEncoder: Fix exception if request body contains partial % encoding

This exception could also happen if the request body exceeds QUERY_STRING_LIMIT and truncated happened in the middle of a percent encoded character. Avoided by switching CdxRequestEncoder to use our own percent decoding method instead of URLDecoder.

Fixes #78

diff --git a/test/org/netpreserve/jwarc/cdx/CdxRequestEncoderTest.java b/test/org/netpreserve/jwarc/cdx/CdxRequestEncoderTest.java

@@ -29,6 +29,8 @@ public class CdxRequestEncoderTest {
                     MediaType.WWW_FORM_URLENCODED, "foo=bar&dir=%2Fbaz"),
             new Case("__wb_method=POST&__wb_post_data=/w==",
                     MediaType.WWW_FORM_URLENCODED, new byte[]{-1}),
+            new Case("__wb_method=POST&snowman=%E2%98%83",
+                    MediaType.WWW_FORM_URLENCODED, "snowman=☃"),
             new Case("__wb_method=POST&a=b&a.2_=2&d=e",
                     MediaType.JSON, "{\"a\": \"b\", \"c\": {\"a\": 2}, \"d\": \"e\"}"),
             new Case("__wb_method=POST",
